titleStmt.title: The defence of the nonconformists plea for peace, or, An account of the matter of their nonconformity against Mr. J. Cheney's answer called The conforming nonconformist, and The nonconforming conformist : to which is added the second part in answer to Mr. Cheney's Five undertakings / by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
